start.text: I'll show you hell. You'll LOVE IT.
What beautiful bugs to crush, you spoil me.
I THINK IT'S TIME TO RUIN SOME BODIES.

start_boss.text: What a large insect, it's death will look beautiful.

retreat.text: This is second in command, the captain is passed out drunk. Retreating.

need_help.text: I'll show you a secret. Come closer.
'SO MANY PRETTY LIGHTS.' 'Captain those are gamma warnings, we need to get out of here'.

pursuing.text: I WONDER WHERE YOU THINK YOU'RE GOING.
HELLO HELLO HELLO, DO YOU SCREAM WELL?
'Second in command here, Captain is up top with their rifle'.

running.text: NO. WE'RE NOT LEAVI... *Clang* 'Taking command Captain, heading out.'

hull_90.text: YOU THINK THAT FREAKING HURT? COME HERE.
Engineering says we are primed to RAM their ship... Please?
You think you're FUNNY? I'll show you FUNNY.

hull_50.text: Good pretty bugs DON'T FIRE BACK.
WHAT ALARM IS THAT? TURN IT UP IT'S BEAUTIFUL.
Oh you've done it now. RAM THEIR SHIP!

hull_30.text: GET NEXT TO ME SO I CAN HIT YOU WITH MY RIFLE.

overload.text: THE SHIELDS ARE GONE? WHERE'S MY BEER?
THIS IS WHAT I CAME HERE FOR.

death.text: *Sounds of gunfire and fighting inside an enemy vessel.*
LET US DIE TOGETHER THEN. COME HERE.

victory.text: 'Second in command here, Captain is out looking for stragglers with their rifle. Something about rabbit hunting'
